titleStmt.title: SII 8.49: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 49. (A.R. No. 461 of 1902). ON THE SAME WALL.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . sakalabhuvaṉaccakravattikaḷ śrīAvaṉiĀḷappiṟantārāṉa kopperuñciṅkatevaṟku yāṇṭu muppattunālāvatu veṇāṭuṭaiyāṉ Olai . teṉṉavaṉ piramārāyarum jayatuṅkappallavaraaiyarum tillaiampalappallavaraiyarum Uṭaiyār tirucciṟṟampalamuṭaiyār koyil śrīmāheśvarak kaṇkāṇi ceyvārkaḷum śrīkāriyañ ceyvārkaḷum cāmutāyañ ceyvārkaḷum koyilnāyakañ ceyvārkaḷum tirumāḷikaikkūṟu ceyvārkaḷum kaṇakkarum kaṇa
li coḷiśvaramuṭaiyār koyil tiruppaḷḷiaṟainācciyār Avaṉiāḷappiṟantanācciyārkkup pūcaikkup perumāppiḷḷaiyāṉa coḻakoṉār Ātittapaṭṭarāṉa tiruvaiyāṟuṭaiyārum tirucciṟṟampalamuṭaiyār Ulakuṭaiyāṉpaṭṭaṉum pakkal śrīviranārāyaṇaccaruppetimaṅkalattup piṭākai maturāntakanallūril veṟupiṟinta Attiyayaṉapaṭṭarkaḷ Akarappaṟṟu IṟaiyiliUṭaṉ cernta Ivarkaḷ kāṇiyum Iṟaiyiliyumāṉa nilattu Iṟaiyili Uṭpaṭa vilaikoṇṭu tiruppāvā
Oṭṭip paṇṭārattile cātaṉamum Oṭukkip palapaṇi nivantakkāṟarkku jivitam Aṭaitta nilam patiṉeṭṭumāk kāṇi Araikkāṇi muntirikaik kiḻaraiye Iraṇṭumāk kāṇi muntirikaik kiḻ Araiyum tevatāṉam tirunāmattukkāṇiyāy Antarāyam pāṭṭam Uṭpaṭa Iṟaiyiliyāy muṉpu Aṉupavittup pontapaṭiye Aṉupavikkavum Innilam perumpāṭikāval Uṭpaṭa Aṉaittuvaṟkaṅkaḷum Uṭpaṭa Iṟaiyiliyākavum Ippaṭikkut tirumāḷikaiyile
m kaṭavatākaccoṉṉom . Ippaṭi ceyvateṉṟu tevar tirumukam varukaiyil Ittirumukappaṭiye tirumāḷikaiyile kal veṭṭivikkavum kaṭavatākap paṇṇuvate . Ivai veṇāṭuṭaiyāṉ Eḻuttu Eṉṟu pukunta Ēvaṟtiṭṭiṉpaṭi kal veṭṭiyatu .
Digital edition of SII 8.49 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
